title: Question about pre-made Ranked Games
body: Whenever you make a game with another person, and if that person is higher ranked than you, do you verse people who are in their rank/skill level or your own?

replies.body:
Generally speaking the system tends to put you against harder opponents. It is due to a perceived advantage that you and your teammate have due to being premade and having access to communication such as discord.

While I couldn't find anything official about it, it is what the community has generally found to be true.

It actually tends to give a mix up of your MMR and your duo's MMR, I've duo'd with someone one rank higher than me [(D4)& myself being D5] and goy put into a game with a bunch of low/mid plats simply because my MMR was crapola...
(am hardstuck)
It tries to even the team out i suppose. & just remember it's not rank but MMR

You will tend to go up against people higher rank than you. Simply because their MMR and your MMR are entirely set on different level for their rank so it will calculate the suitable rank of players to play against between the two of you. E.g Bronze and higher silver- you will end up playing mid silver to low silver, such and such. But the game also tends to do odd stuff and put you  against or with different ranks that completely off the charts if your MMR is high
